main.name: Adrián Cruz
main.bio: Project Manager leveraging experience as an IoT entrepreneur and in engineering, product development, and business commercialization. Proven expertise developing innovative and user-centric applications. Successfully landed the first major client and delivered a fully functional MVP for a San Antonio based startup focused on hassle-free client management solutions and provisionally patented an infant monitoring device capable of analyzing vital signs in real-time and providing relevant feedback for parents. An excellent interpersonal communicator and collaborator who works well on team-based projects as well as independently.
